1111.content:
Sonic loved his life. Everywhere he went women were in awe of his presence and fell for him hard. A human princess, Amy showered him with gifts instead of it being vice versa(But that was all she was good for-Presents), Rouge tried to seduce him with her boobs daily, Princess Sally, and many more. And though he loved the affection, he knew it couldn't keep it up forever. So one day he finally told the girls everywhere the truth. "Sorry girls, but I'm gay." Sonic told them right in front of them.

A stunned silence covered the group. And slowly it rose into a panic. "SONICS GAY! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! NOT MY SONIC! NOT MY PRECIOUS SONIC!" Cried Amy in agony as she fell into the fetal position and began to suck her thumb. By the end of the day Amy would be hospitalized with insanity, paranoia, and 5000 multiple personalities. And all of them WERE EXACTLY THE SAME! "Not our Sonic! Not our Sonic! He's ours! He's ours! We bought him presents! We bathed him with a affection. He would always come to our birthday parties." Cried a insane Amy, her fur turned white within seconds of hearing the news and she was chained up in a straight jacket. And Amy lived a life of sorrow and misery. The End!

Now back to the plot. Although not surprised by Amys reaction, He was surprised by the rest of the girls actions. They took very surprisingly well. "Pffft. I knew you were gay the moment these didn't seduce you the first time I showed you." Rouge said as she flashed him her boobs. Which still had no affect.

"So why did you keep showing them to me?" Sonic asked, confused by her statement.

"Because I like it when gay men look at me and don't go 'BOOBIES!'." Rouge told him the truth. And he couldn't have looked any more dumbstrucked by the statement. The rest of the girls sweatdropped when they heard the explanation. Then each of the girls began telling him that they were happy for him and they still wanted him. Even if they couldn't have him.

"Thanks girls. But if you excuse me, I have a date with Shadow in a few minutes." Sonic said as he ran off, leaving a blue streak in his tracks. And so began his openly gay life. Sonic was living in a luxurious mansion, given to him by Princess Sally after she find out he was gay(Incidentally, it seems she has a fetish for gay men and suffered a massive nose bleed that required her to be sent to the hospital). He enjoyed his same, simple life. He ate, sped around, beat Knuckles in dules, and destroyed Dr. Eggman's plans for world domination on a daily basis.

Eventually Tails moved in with him, taking several rooms and the garage as his personal lab. Shadow decided to move in as well(talking about Sonic being incompetent and he must show the inferior fool how to fight right.). Silver the Hedgehog for some reason decided to come from the future and is now living with Sonic all the time. Though Blaze the Cat did tell Silver to be prepared for anything that happens before he left. For Sonic would somehow change forever. Then the human Chris(who is currently twelve. AGAIN), hated by every living thing in existence(Including the writer), also joined him and for some reason 'couldn't' return to his world. Not that he actually TRIED to return in the first place. Knuckles parked his floating island into the middle of a really REALLY big lake that was right near Sonic's mansion. Though he came over on a daily basis about wanting to 'teach Sonic a lesson' though Sonic was the one teaching him how to do things 'right at night'.

Thus Sonic lived his life with just about every male he had ever banged-I mean been with. And he lived his life normally, sleeping, eating, having sex, and crushing every one of Eggmans plans. Till one day....

"Argh! I'm so bored. There hasn't been anything to do since forever." Sonic yawned. All of his male companions were gone, having left to the city to get supplies for food or to randomly fight Eggbots that appear from time to time. He hadn't stopped a Eggman plot in ages. Thinking about something to do. He finally made a choice. "I know! I'll go see what Tails has been doing in the lab!" With that he was off. And seconds later he was in the lab. The sheer gust of wind slammed the door into the wall and send several machines and paper flying.

"I wonder what he's working on now." Sonic thought as he looked around the room. That's when he noticed a new machine that resembled a Death Ray. In a flash he was next to it, examinining all the little details. "I wonder what it does?" As he looked around it, he noticed there wasn't a button on it that activated it. "Hmmph! Seems Chris and Tails don't like it when I use their machines." With that Sonic took a step back, activating a remote that just happen to be around his feet. Looking down, Sonic grinned happily since he found the remote needed to the machine. The machine silently powered up, until it shot three small red beams that fuse into one larger one that hit Sonic in the back.

"OUCH! This thing shot me!" Sonic said pain. It had felt like being stung by a bee. Sonic didn't know what he just did, but he hoped Tails could fix it. "Until then I might as well check out what we have to eat." And with that he was off again, going to feast like a king.
1111.title: Pride of the Blue Beast and his harem

11111.content:
Sonic made his way to the table, ordering his personal chefs to make him the tastiest, most diverse dinner they could think of. Within half an hour, all sorts of food was on the table: chili dogs, chili, ham, turkey, chicken, mashed potatoes, corn, just about ANYTHING he could want. A little known fact was Sonic ate a lot, but he burned it off due to how much he ran around, and the resulting high metabolism.
Sonic grabbed one of the drumsticks, tearing into it. His chefs watched in fear, he gave a thumbs up and motioned for them to return to their duties. Minutes passed, the hedgehog just as fast as he ate the food as he could run around. Half the table was gone, Sonic moaning in pain as he rubbed his clearly distended belly.
"Ohhh...ate too much..." Then Sonic looked down. He would overeat to fuel his speed, but NEVER to this point. It was larger then scientifically possible. Then he could hear incredibly loud gurgles as his stomach went to work on his meal, never having been that fast before, OR THAT LOUD!
Then a stranger thing happened...Sonic's stomach let out a massive growl, causing him to blush. How could he STILL be hungry?! Sonic nonetheless jumped on the table, and within minutes he had devoured every last bit of food, even licking the plates clean..but something was odd. The food wasn't...filling him. He craved more...and then a thought popped into his head. Live food...swallowing whoever it was down like a snake, minus the venom or constriction...the prey helplessly wriggling as it was confined to it's fate in the darkness of his belly.
Sonic felt somewhat guilty at the thoughts, but he was also somewhat aroused, his good sized hedgehog shaft poking from his fur. He blushed at the embarassment, luckily he had dismissed his cooks already. He hopped off the table, wiping his mouth clean. It couldn't hurt to go eat someone right? Seeing as how he always protected people from Eggman...
11111.title: Squirmy food is better :3

1131.content:
Knuckles had been guarding the Master Emerald, making sure nothing would happen to it. But he was beaten and worn out beyond repair. "Geez." He huffed as he wiped his forehead, sweat oozed all over him. He had spent the last week doing nothing but stopping Rouge from trying to steal the master Emerald. He had all ready stopped three hundred and twenty seven attempts within the past SEVEN DAYS! And it looked like she wouldn't be stopping until she got what she wanted. It was a battle of endurance and Knuckles was losing the war. He had even gone without sleeping, because Rouge always sent that former Eggman robot to attack during the day when she rested. And she would finish his work during the night.

"Huff huff huff" Knuckles breathed as he laid near the Master Emerald. He was so exhausted! Just one little nap wouldn't hurt? "No. One nap wouldn't-" Knuckles did not finish his sentence, and had fallen in a deep sleep.

And as if fate was a cruel demon. A mysterious figure had opened a hold into the underground temple through the roof. A helicopter was high above the hole. And the mysterious figure began to glide down to the Emerald, and the figure was none other than Rouge. "Seems poor Knux couldn't handle little ol me for so long!" Rouge cooed in triumph as the helicopter sent a large claw down that grabbed the Master Emerald, lifting it into the flying machine. Rouge then pulled something out of her pocket, a note and a vial. "This will keep his preoccupied. After all, poor Knuckles here is the most gullible man in the world." And with that she was off to the Helicopter. And in seconds both her and the machine were long gone.

Knuckles woke up twenty hours later, his body attempting to make up for all the sleep he had lost. "Aaaah." Knuckles yawned as he got up, rubbing his eye of the crust that had hardened around it. "That was the best nap I've ever-" Knuckles turned around. Only to stare dumbstruck at the empty space that once stood the Master Emerald. "WHO STOLE THE MASTER EMERALD!?!" Roared Knuckles. Within seconds every bird on the island was gone, the sound of the raging Knuckles sending them off. After releasing some of his rage, Knuckles noticed a note and a vial had been exchanged for it. Bending down, he grabbed the note and read it.

Sorry Knuckles but I need to borrow the Master Emerald for a while. I hope this vial makes up for it! Catch ya later!-Sonic The Hedgehog

"Curse you Sonic!!!" Shouted Knuckles in a bloodthirsty rage as he slammed his fist into the ground, the impact causing a small crater to appear beneath him and sent the same into a earthquake. "Just to teach you a lesson for stealing the Master Emerald! I'll not only use this vial but I'll take back the Master Emerald and split your head in two!" With that Knuckles pulled out the cork lid and drank the vials containments. A light green liquid ooze into Knuckles mouth. Finishing the contents whole, Knuckles smacked his lips together as he tossed the vial. "Aaah! That stuff was delicious! It had a sweet taste of Honey. And now to teach Sonic a lesson!" And with that Knuckles was off to Sonics home. Ready to teach that Blue Spikey freak a lesson in not taking other peoples precious things, completely forgetting that Rouge was after the Emerald less than a day ago.
1131.title: Grr! Just you wait Sonic!

1141.content:
Shadow was pacing through the forest, very slowly. He was looking for the green Chaos Emerald, which he coveted, as it had been the first he had ever found.
While he had been walking earlier, he had gotten a surprise. Out of nowhere, a snake had come out and bitten his hand. The Green Emerald fell, and before Shadow could respond, it had somehow swallowed it and slithered away. Now Shadow was stuck looking for the thing! He didn't fear if it was venomous, he would be immune if it was.
This didn't help his recent stress. Shadow had only just recently found out that he apparently 'likes the cock' as Sonic had put it teasingly. It was amazing Shadow didn't kill him right there. So he lost his apparent straightness, AND he lost his emerald. He was going to kill the snake if he got his hands on it.
And then he heard it, that slithering sound. Heading towards it, he smiled. Shadow was in luck! The snake that had taken the emerald was right there, large and massive as it was, but with a slight bulge where the emerald was. He lowered himself right before it's head, staring it down.
"It was pretty sneaky of you to grab the emerald from me like that...but your luck's run out. Cough the emerald up, and maybe I'll kill you painlessly." Shadow grinned at it. The snake only hissed, opening it's jaws wide and showing off the dark gullet, and those massive fangs. Shadow didn't seem to react at all when it lunged forward, taking his head in it's jaws. Apparently the snake thought it could wolf down the ultimate life form. How deadly mistaken.
Without showing fear, Shadow's hand collided with the snake's head from above, in a powerful blow that either knocked it out or killed it. Shadow was easily able to slip his head from it's jaws, before placing his hand inside it's maw. He grimaced at the slimy insides, but it needed to be done. He felt it's barely living breath go over his arm as he slipped more and more into it, down the slimy tunnel of a throat. His face was pressing against it's scaly maw when he finally gripped the hard stone of the gem. He smirked as he grasped it before removing it with speed from the snake's belly.
He stood up, tossing it triumphantly and catching it in his hand. "Well now that I got the emerald back, I think it's time for you to-" Shadow was interrupted by a strange feeling in his body. Unknown to Shadow, for some reason the emerald had absorbed the snake's hunger, making it part of the jewel's essence. It had absorbed it's flexibility as well. Shadow looked down at the unconscious snake for a moment, finding himself subconsciously licking his lips.
He shook his head. He couldn't eat a snake! The thought alone was just sick, besides, he couldn't fit that thing in if he tried! But then his gut grumbled very loudly. It had never done that before. To Shadow, eating was a pure luxury, not needed due to his practical 'Demi-God' biology. He reluctantly started to crouch over once more, placing one of his gloved hands on the snake's head and lifting it up. The snake was heavy, not surprising given it's large size. It probably would've devoured Shadow had he been someone weaker.
"Well, I guess the tables do turn after all." After Shadow had finished his sentence, his jaws had opened...wide. Wide like a snake's. He didn't recall being blessed with such a power, so he had no idea how he was doing it. He slid the reptile's head into his jaws, sitting down, for the weight of swallowing such a creature whole would likely make him fall.
One gulp after the other the thick body of the snake slid inside. It was amazing Shadow didn't gag or choke on the thing! He began to get to the thickest point, his stomach swollen out more then he thought possible. Soon the tip of the large 'serpent''s tail was approaching his muzzle. He managed to gulp, then slurped the tail up like a noodle and force it down as well. The reptile was coiled up inside the belly of the hedgehog, who had not exploded from the sheer size of the thing.
Shadow was panting...taken aback at swallowing the beast. His pants soon became murrs...the feeling of such a stretched girth...one of his hands rubbing over it...he practically moaned. It was amazing he hadn't gotten aroused, it felt so good.
Shadow leaned back, seemingly oblivious to danger...his hand rubbing over the large dome of flesh and fur that concealed his meal. He knew his metabolism would accelerate if he drifted off to sleep. So he tucked the emerald nearby, putting his weight on it, and soon feel asleep...to see many dreams that were far more cannibalistic in nature.
1141.title: Shadow (M/M Gay storyline)

14.content: Tiger the cat was walking home from going to the movies. She was very happy. But her stomach growled. How could it? She just ate popcorn and nachos at the movies and ice cream afterwards. She didn't care though. She went home. When she got home, she decided to watch television. She clicked it on. It was on cats. She stared. It said, "Cats are magnificent creatures. Today's episode is about cats hunting. Cats have extremely sharp claws. The she-cats have sharper claws. They use it to catch their prey. Sometimes cats can catch and eat things two times bigger than they are." Tiger thought about this for a moment before listening to the program again. " Cats love food and sleeping. Most of the time cats eat their prey by shredding it. But some cats eat their prey whole, swallowing it bit by bit. Domestic cats usually live in homes and wild cats live in forests. They survive on their natural instincts. Thank you for listening." Tiger turned off the televion. Her brain was twirling with information from the program. Sometimes cats can catch and eat things two times bigger than they are, thought Tiger. Her stomach growled. For some reason, she didn't want food. Her instincts told her animal. And to swallow it whole. But who should she eat?
14.title: Tiger the Cat watches some vore television.

**Note** This takes place during the end of the Dark Side story of SA2. Shadow has just beaten Sonic in the race/battle. It can be implied Shadow either killed Sonic offscreen like he promised, or Sonic got away. Here's the more vorish verison.

Sonic kept on running, avoiding the many strikes of Shadow. He was able to dodge many Chaos Spears and avoid the kicks and punches Shadow would use after he Chaos Controlled nearby, but it was taking his toll. Shadow had landed some hits, and from the looks of things, the 'Ultimate Life Form' wasn't tiring. Sonic himself grasped his yellow emerald, knowing he had to get away.
"Chaos...-ugh!" Sonic was interrupted mid-sentence by a sharp blow to the back. The gold streak going by him implied that Shadow had used the homing attack, to great success. Sonic collapsed onto the floating highway beneath his feet, twitching. The emerald flew from his hands. As he reached for it, he saw the all too familiar hand of Shadow grab it.
"What about you isn't fake? You copy me, and you copy an emerald...pathetic." With that, Shadow threw the emerald over the side of the highway, it disappeared below. Sonic was completely screwed now.
"I-I'm not going to give up that easi-" Sonic was interrupted again, this time by a sharp kick to the jaw. He was rolled over onto his back due to the force of the blow.
"Shut up." Shadow said as he paced, eyeing the blue 'hero'.
"Ugh..." Sonic was barely able to get out, too beaten and broken from Shadow's attacks.
He heard Shadow grunt, almost happily. "Hmph. You may be a faker, and you may be my enemy...but I will admit, you've been able to copy me nearly flawlessly...your looks, your drive to achieve victory, the Chaos Control...all copied perfectly." Shadow reached down, grabbing the barely moving hedgehog by the scruff of the neck. As he lifted him upwards, he grinned, making it clear to the blue hero.
"Whatever, faker..." Sonic winced as Shadow pinched the back of his neck, as well as delivering a kick to his gut, all while holding him.
"Unfortunately for you, Sonic...there's only room for one Ultimate Life Form...and it has to be me." Shadow said, staring into Sonic's green eyes. The cold stare became warmer as Shadow smiled. "But not to worry. You'll have the honor of leaving this world by becoming PART of the Ultimate Life. You've tried so much to emulate me...now you'll be able to be me."
"Wh-what the hell does that mean?" Sonic said, weakly trying to pry himself from Shadow's grasp.
Shadow himself reached behind himself, pulling out a Chaos Emerald. "I snatched one of these...with Chaos Control, there will be PLENTY of time to return it to the good Doctor. Chaos...CONTROL!" As Shadow uttered those words, the many shooting stars around them slowed down, as did everything else. Shadow and Sonic, however, remained perfectly fine. "With time supposedly slowed down...we'll do this quickly. Time for us to become one, faker."
As Sonic pondered that, he noticed the grin leaving Shadow's face as his jaws opened...wide. Wider then was human, er hedgehogly possible. Sonic shivered a bit as he looked inside, seeing the white teeth, the sharp canines...the slimy, wet flesh and tongue...and at the back, that pulsating, dark throat. Shadow's warm breath washed over Sonic's face.
As he was inched closer, Shadow spoke. "I was endowed with many abilities by the Professor...one of them being large degrees of flexibility...INSIDE and out. Allow me to demonstrate..."
Sonic's nose bumped into Shadow's tongue, an incredibly odd feeling. Shadow's jaws seemed much larger up close. As Sonic finally got the hint of what the black hedgehog intended to do, he uttered a few last words...
"F-fuck you." He got out before he felt his muzzle slide all the way onto the tongue, Shadow's hand gripping his quills and matting them down so they'd be easier to swallow. Shadow would have grinned at Sonic's words, had he not have had a mouthful of said hedgehog.
Sonic grimaced as Shadow's large, slimy tongue licked across his face, he would've punched the hedgehog had he had the strength. He was even more disgusted at the 'Mmmm' he could clearly hear, implying Shadow's enjoyment.
Shadow was resisting the urge to laugh. The once great hero of Earth, Sonic, was in his jaws, helpless. Nothing but a large piece of meat. He then strengthened his grip on Sonic, before swallowing powerfully, an audible yelp coming from Sonic, who was caught by surprise. His throat bulged out as Sonic's head slid deeper inside, his squirming intensifying.
"Come on...there's gotta be a way out of this!" Sonic was trying to move his arms to grip Shadow and escape, or at least keep him from swallowing any further, but the slickness of the jaws they were starting to enter, combined with the strong smell of the throat, was weakening him. Shadow's throat rippled around him, and yet another gulp made Sonic realise he was indeed going to be part of Shadow if he didn't do something. He thrashed about, trying to cut Shadow with his quills, but Shadow had matted them down against his back with saliva.
With one of his main weapons nullified, Sonic would be easy prey. Shadow was up to his chest and some of his round stomach, his lips keeping Sonic's arms pinned to his sides. Shadow reached forward, and removed Sonic's gloves. They would obstruct the flavor all too much! Shadow desired to taste every inch of his blue counterpart, and no cloth would stop him.
Shadow re-adjusted his grip as more weight started to go down into him, Sonic sliding deeper. Shadow braced himself for the harder part, and with a VERY powerful swallow, managed to get the whole of the hero's torso into his maw. As he lapped across the stomach area, Sonic twitched, trying to hold back the tickling sensation. Shadow simply thought 'How pathetic...' at his reactions.
On Sonic's end, he was slowly being pushed down further, and much as he hated to admit it, the feeling of being encased in Shadow's warmth was actually starting to be good. The warm innards greatly contrasted the cold space outside. But he remembered the world needed him, and to that end, he tried to think up a way out.
He was surprised when his head hit something muscular. He grinned. "Ha! Bit off more then you could chew, huh fak-" Before Sonic finished, the muscular area opened, and his muzzle slid down. The are was far more roomy, and filled with hot, humid air. It took him a moment, but then he realised: THIS was Shadow's stomach. The literal belly of the beast.
Shadow only further aided his throat muscles, with another gulp, Sonic's groin, hips and rear end had slid past his lips. Sonic's tail twitched as Shadow continued to lick over Sonic, licking the most sensitive parts of his body - his rear and his groin. Sonic couldn't help but let out a moan from within the swelling belly of the black hedgehog. Shadow would have loved to tease the hedgehog more, but he had an emerald to return. So he promptly gulped again, and Sonic slid in up to his knees. His squirms remained strong, but less out of fear and more out of pleasure.
Sonic wiggled about in the soft, spacious yet tight and muscular belly of Shadow. He couldn't help but sigh. At least he tried...but he couldn't help but grin. Shadow had been a good opponent, and was claiming the spoils of his victory. At least Sonic found solace in this way of going..he'd become part of something stronger then himself.
Shadow's hand rubbed over his swelling girth as more of Sonic piled into it. He removed Sonic's shoes promptly, his socks right afterwards. With a shove on his feet and another swallow, Sonic had slid in up his ankles, only the very feet he was so famous for remaining outside Shadow's jaws.
As Sonic was crammed into the tight but expanding stomach, he reflected upon all the events that had occurred. He and Shadow had fought several times, encountered eachother several times. Even with their clear hatred, they had become more like rivals then enemies. They even had a casual conversation before their final showdown. It was a fair fight, Sonic and Shadow were evenly matched...but apparently Shadow was better.
Shadow slurped Sonic's feet into his maw with minimal effort, his tongue licking over his soles, causing Sonic's wiggling to increase. Shadow murred as a result of the wriggling meal within him. After a moment, he tired, and tilted his head back, and with a final gulp, claimed his victory over the world's hero.
Sonic's feet quickly slid into the black hole of his throat, soon joining the rest of him in Shadow's tight gut. Shadow himself had fallen back, it had been quite some time since he had devoured such a large meal at once. And in one piece, as well. He stroked a hand over his full stomach, practically purring. Soon the hedgehog would be alll his. Just as the world would soon be his master's.
"You put up a good fight, faker...but as I said, there can be only ONE Ultimate Life..." Shadow lay back, relaxing. With time near practically frozen around them, he could relax for a while. Sonic's squirms had stopped, but as he felt around, he realised Sonic was not dead. Sonic was apparently sleeping in his warm, slimy bed chamber. Shadow only chuckled. At least Sonic was able to admit defeat. He dozed off, his stomach soon emitting loud gurgles as it worked to break down and absorb the hedgehog within.
----
When Shadow awoke, he stood up. Time was still going slow, thank goodness. As he gripped the emerald on the ground nearby, he looked down. Though the bulge had shrunk, it was still massive. He gave his stomach another pat. He blushed as he let out a loud burp. Shadow had forgotten about those coming with large meals. He chuckled as he picked up Sonic's gloves, socks and shoes, looking over the edge of the highway. He promptly tossed them over and watched them fall to Earth.
"Sayonara...Sonic the Hedgehog." Shadow said, before grasping the jewel and heading back to the ARK's Control Room.

info.brief_description: The sequel/remake of my other Sonic Vore story!
info.description:
Welcome to the Neo Sonic Vore Interactive! A remake of my older story (which can be found in my portfolio), this version will be chock full of much better content, I'm sure.
I chose to make a new story instead of purging the old one to keep a 'museum' of sorts. You can look back on the old days of my and others' writing. And quite possibly, on one of the largest Sonic vore stories to ever be born.

Here are some rules and the rewards system:

-You can do practically anything, except for really weird fetishes(watersports and such, NOT ALLOWED.) Stuff like WG(to an extent) and homosexual sex are allowed. Just put warnings in the chapter or title.
-All forms of vore except hard, nasal, and ear vore are allowed.
-For a selection chapter(i.e. pick a character) you will recieve 10 points.
-For longer chapters, you can recieve anything from 30 - 100 points, depending on quality and length.

-Have fun! ^__^
